subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Eric Gordon had 11 of his 17 points in the second half Sunday as the 10th-ranked Hoosiers rallied from a 7-point deficit to defeat the Illini, 62-58.
snippet: Eric Gordon had 11 of his 17 points in the second half Sunday as the 10th-ranked Hoosiers rallied from a 7-point deficit to defeat the Illini, 62-58.
